channel.title: AutoCast #4
channel.description:
Okay, 4th post now, and still no success.
I've used some tuts off rune-server, to try and get 1 autocasting spell. Then, from that i can work on the others...
Soooo.... I've got it to do the Gfx, and the hitdiff.. Problem is that, before i attack my oponent, when i click the spell to autocast with.. It attacks normal, like a weapon...
In the fight, when i click the spell book, then the spell again.. It activates the case.. Right?.. So it does the method called..
In that case, i put my method. E.G. [code] AutoCasting(); [/code]
But it doesn't loop...
Does anyone have a working loop that will make it cast over and over again?..
I'm not too bothered how many times it does it.. It can be a simple for loop, that does it 500 times with a timer.. I just need it to attack over and over.. Without me have to keep clicking the spell every time i attack -.-..
Please, much apreciated.

item.title: AutoCast #4
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Okay, 4th post now, and still no success.

I’ve used some tuts off rune-server, to try and get 1 autocasting spell. Then, from that i can work on the others…

Soooo… I’ve got it to do the Gfx, and the hitdiff… Problem is that, before i attack my oponent, when i click the spell to autocast with… It attacks normal, like a weapon…

In the fight, when i click the spell book, then the spell again… It activates the case… Right?.. So it does the method called…

In that case, i put my method. E.G.

AutoCasting();

But it doesn’t loop…

Does anyone have a working loop that will make it cast over and over again?..

I’m not too bothered how many times it does it… It can be a simple for loop, that does it 500 times with a timer… I just need it to attack over and over… Without me have to keep clicking the spell every time i attack -.-…

Please, much apreciated.

Read full topic
